instructions: Place a dinner fork on the left side with its tines pointed up
place a dinner knife on the right side with the blade facing left
place a salad fork to the left of the dinner fork with its tines facing up
place a salad knife to the right of the dinner knife with its blade facing the dinner knife
place a soup spoon to the left of the salad knife with its bowl facing up
place a dessert spoon at the top with its bowl facing left
move the desert spoon from the top to the right of the soup spoon with its bowl facing up
reposition the dessert spoon to its original position and orientation<br>
place a dinner plate at the bottom, between the salad fork, dessert spoon, and dinner knife
place a bread plate to the top left of the dinner plate
place butter knife on bread plate, angled from top right to bottom left, blade facing dinner plate
place a wine glass above the soup spoon
&nbsp;place a water glass between the wine glass and dessert spoon
fold a napkin and it place in the center of the dinner plate
